skill.name: behaviors.skills.Patrol
skill.description: To visit a given set of entities in a given order. When it has visited the last entity, the agent starts over with the first one. The set of entities and the order of visit are user defined. The skill performs by activating the MoveAlong skill with the set of entities.

parameter.name: entities
parameter.description: The list of entities to defining a patrol round. The list must be ordered such a way that its nth element represents the nth entity to visit on the agentâ€™s round.
